structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

text.section: There is hereby created an Architectural Barriers Advisory Committee which shall be attached to the Department of Housing, Buildings and Construction for administrative purposes. The committee members shall be appointed by the Governor to serve a term of two (2) years and shall be constituted as follows: three (3) persons having a physical disability, one (1) citizen at large, and the public advocate or his designee.

The committee shall meet at least quarterly or upon request of the board for the purposes of considering matters relating to accessibility and safety in facilities for persons with physical disabilities. The committee shall make recommendations to and otherwise advise the department and the board on these matters.
The committee members will receive no compensation for their services, but will be reimbursed for their necessary travel expenses.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 258, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 50, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1980.
